title: Virtual Reality (VR)-Based Soccer Referee Decision-Making Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Soccer Match Rules, Basic Referee Signals, and Foundational Sports Education Knowledge
context.additional_context: Aims to improve decision-making abilities in environments simulating real competitions, applying research findings that VR technology has high correlation with actual field behavior

learning_goals: Learners make accurate situational judgments with 90% or higher accuracy through VR-based training in various open-play scenarios.
Learners demonstrate visual behaviors (gaze speed, fixation duration, head movements) similar to real-game situations in VR environments.
Learners measure situational awareness improved by 80% or higher in formative assessments after VR training.

resources: Soccer Referee Decision-Making Scenario Video Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
